title: Sinan Yeşiltaş Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Sinan Yeşiltaş? Check out all of Sinan Yeşiltaş's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogSinan Yeşiltaş SEO Manager, SEMTR Sinan Yeşiltaş Sinan Yeşiltas helps companies (mostly e-commerce) to grow their organic traffic. He has experience working on some of the international largest brands with huge e-commerce hierarchy setups, URL migrations, and tech solutions. He always examines the SEO & UX relationships deeply to enable him present two data based perspectives. He currently works for SEMTR, the first and largest independent Data Driven Marketing Agency in Turkey, as the SEO Manager.
